name: Mercedes Benz
description: Mercedes-Benz is a German luxury automobile brand, and one of the world's leading manufacturers of high-end passenger cars, vans, and trucks. Founded in 1926, the company is known for its luxury, comfort, innovation, and a long history of pioneering automotive technology, with roots dating back to the inventions of Carl Benz and Gottlieb Daimler.
visual: Mercedes Benz brand car, an atmosphere of superiority, reliability and elitism.
